javadoc:
An interface used with {@link AnimationUtils} to allow clients to use the timing 
 framework while performing their own painting.

methods.name: paint
methods.comment: Called back each time the animation system generates a timing event.

params.name: glassPane
params.comment: the glass pane upon which painting takes place

params.name: percentComplete
params.comment: a value from 0 to 1, 1 being fully complete.

name: AnimationPainter
comment:
An interface used with AnimationUtils to allow clients to use the timing 
 framework while performing their own painting.
